exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad la, ls : prec_list hd : term tl : term_list r : reconnaissance d a hd H1 : u_conv_rec_0_r d a hd r H2 : liste_reconnait d la tl l : u_conv_lr_0_r d la tl H2 H3 : preDTA H4 : prec_list H5 : d = udta_conv_0 H3 The term "H1" has type "u_conv_rec_0_r d a hd r" while it is expected to have type "u_conv_rec_0 d a hd r".

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl r H1 H2 l H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: The reference d was not found in the current environment.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl r H1 H2 l H3 H4. intro H5. apply (u_conv0_3 d a la ls hd tl r H1 l H3). apply (u_conv_lr_0_r d a hd r H2).
